books.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
books.author: Delia Owens
books.description: A poignant tale of a young girl raised in the marshlands of North Carolina, navigating a world filled with mystery, love, and heartache.

books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: A mesmerizing novel about a library beyond life where each book provides a chance to live another life you could have lived, and to see how things would be different.

books.title: The Vanishing Half
books.author: Brit Bennett
books.description: A multi-generational family saga that explores the lasting influence of the past as it shapes a person's decisions, desires, and expectations.

books.title: The Four Winds
books.author: Kristin Hannah
books.description: An epic novel of love and heroism and hope, set against the backdrop of one of America’s most defining eras—the Great Depression.

books.title: A Promised Land
books.author: Barack Obama
books.description: A riveting, deeply personal account of history in the making—from the president who inspired us to believe in the power of democracy.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: An easy and proven way to build good habits and break bad ones.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.description: A shocking psychological thriller of a woman's act of violence against her husband—and of the therapist obsessed with uncovering her motive.

books.title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
books.author: V.E. Schwab
books.description: A life no one will remember. A story you will never forget.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A global phenomenon, this story of Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy who yearns to travel in search of a worldly treasure, is full of wisdom and wonder.

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.description: A memoir about a young girl who, kept out of school, leaves her survivalist family and goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge University.

books.title: Becoming
books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: An intimate, powerful, and inspiring memoir by the former First Lady of the United States.

books.title: The Book Thief
books.author: Markus Zusak
books.description: A gripping, heart-wrenching novel about a young girl's survival during World War II in Nazi Germany.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: A stunning blend of adventure and mysticism, environmentalism and politics, Dune won the first Nebula Award, shared the Hugo Award, and formed the basis of what is undoubtedly the grandest epic in science fiction.

books.title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A novel about an aging and reclusive Hollywood movie icon as she reflects on her relentless rise to the top and the risks she took, the loves she lost, and the long-held secrets the public could never imagine.

books.title: Little Fires Everywhere
books.author: Celeste Ng
books.description: A riveting novel that traces the intertwined fates of the picture-perfect Richardson family and the enigmatic mother and daughter who upend their lives.

books.title: Circe
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.description: A bold and subversive retelling of the goddess's story, Circe is a triumph of storytelling, an intoxicating epic of family rivalry, palace intrigue, love, and loss.

books.title: The Song of Achilles
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.description: A thrilling and unique retelling of the legend of Achilles, this novel brings a tale of gods, kings, immortal fame, and the human heart.

books.title: Normal People
books.author: Sally Rooney
books.description: A stunning novel about the transformative power of relationships.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the dangers of totalitarianism.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: The novel's protagonist Holden Caulfield has become an icon for teenage rebellion.
